template:
ThinkLAB-1239 - Your IP Geo Location

Try this in case it does not work or you use a VM: Find your City Location

Please wait a little ...


Infos From https://geolocation-db.com

name: Check
API documentation
info: https://weather.com/swagger-docs/call-for-code

name: Mapping
func:
msg.payloadold=msg.payload
msg.payload={}
//msg.payload.windDirection=msg.payloadold.windDirection
msg.payload.temperature=msg.payloadold.temperature
msg.payload.observation=msg.payloadold.wxPhraseLong
msg.payload.humidity   =msg.payloadold.relativeHumidity
msg.payload.pressure   =msg.payloadold.pressureMeanSeaLevel
msg.payload.uvindex    =msg.payloadold.uvIndex
msg.payload.precip     =msg.payloadold.precip1Hour
msg.payload.icon       =msg.payloadold.iconCode
msg.payload.ts         =Date.now()
msg.payload.messtime   =msg.payloadold.validTimeLocal
msg.payload.day=msg.payloadold.dayOfWeek
msg.payload.lat=parseFloat(global.get("lat"))
msg.payload.lon=parseFloat(global.get("lon"))
msg.payload.source="TWC"
msg.payload.unit=global.get("unit")
msg.payload.pws=global.get("labid")
msg.deviceId="pws"+msg.payload.pws
return msg;

name: GetMyPWS
Set PWS Markter
use url ....  youinstance mybluemix.net/worldallpws
info:
or 
https://.....mybluemix.net/ui/
or
https://thinklab1239.mybluemix.net/worldallpws

name: Mapping/Send ISS info
func:
//Maybe call the weather API
msg.payloadold=msg.payload
msg.payload={}
msg.payload.temperature=msg.payloadold.temperature
msg.payload.observation=msg.payloadold.wxPhraseLong
msg.payload.humidity   =msg.payloadold.relativeHumidity
msg.payload.pressure   =msg.payloadold.pressureMeanSeaLevel
msg.payload.uvindex    =msg.payloadold.uvIndex
msg.payload.precip     =msg.payloadold.precip1Hour
msg.payload.ts         =Date.now()
msg.payload.messtime   =msg.payloadold.validTimeLocal
msg.payload.day=msg.payloadold.dayOfWeek
msg.payload.lat=(msg.payloadold.iss_position.latitude).toFixed(4)
msg.payload.lon=(msg.payloadold.iss_position.longitude).toFixed(4)
msg.payload.source="TWC"
msg.payload.pws="iss"
msg.deviceId="pwsiss"
return msg;

name: Check
Mapping
func:
msg.payloadold=msg.payload.observations[0]
msg.payload={}
msg.payload.temperature=msg.payloadold.metric.temp
msg.payload.observation=""
msg.payload.humidity   =msg.payloadold.humidity
msg.payload.pressure   =msg.payloadold.metric.pressure
msg.payload.uvindex    =msg.payloadold.uvI
msg.payload.precip     =msg.payloadold.precipTotal
msg.payload.ts         =Date.now()
msg.payload.messtime   =msg.payloadold.obsTimeLocal
msg.payload.stationID=msg.payloadold.stationID
msg.payload.lat=msg.payloadold.lat
msg.payload.lon=msg.payloadold.lon
return msg;

name: Icons
weather icon
Clock Toolbar
format:
<script id="titleScript" type="text/javascript">

$(function() {
    if($('.md-toolbar-tools').length != 0){
        loadClock();
    }else setTimeout(loadClock, 500)
});

function loadClock(){
    $('#clock').remove();
    var toolbar = $('.md-toolbar-tools');
    
    var div = $('<div/>');
    var p = $('<p/ id="clock">');
    
    div.append(p);
    div[0].style.margin = '5px 5px 5px auto';
    toolbar.append(div);

    function displayTitle(lh) {
        p.text(lh); 
    }
    
    function upTime() {
        var d = new Date();
        p.text(d.toLocaleString());
    }

    if(document.clockInterval){ 
            clearInterval(document.clockInterval);
            document.clockInterval = null;
    }
        
    document.clockInterval = setInterval(upTime,1000);
}

</script>

name: What Can I DO / How does this work ?

we will demo it

name: C -> F
func:
val = msg.payload 
f = (val*1.8) + 32;

msg.payload = parseFloat(f).toFixed(1) + " F"
return msg

name: What is this / want can I do?
info:
Here we call the weather api and get the current weather for our location.

See the http Node for details 

We send the weather information to our IoT device with the deviceID pws+LABID like pws42

t

name: Excerise
info:
1. Add some data to our dashboard like pressure. 

2.	Exercise  Change you marker Icon to an emoji
https://github.com/dceejay/RedMap/blob/master/emojilist.md

3.	Exercise  Change the Traffic cam Image 
Change the feed form the traffic cam to like NYC 

NYC traffic cams can be found here. https://511ny.org/map#Camera

4. Addjust the weather icons with the matching connidions

5. Add more informaton like the SunRise and winddirection  to yout mapping on the sensor tab
6. Connect the 24 hour forcast on the Util Page

the dashboard is available via the url liek
